faqs.ques: How do I reset my password?
faqs.ans: Click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow the instructions to reset your password.

faqs.ques: Can I cancel my order after placing it?
faqs.ans: Yes, you can cancel your order before it is shipped. Once shipped, cancellations are not allowed.

faqs.ques: Do you provide warranty on products?
faqs.ans: Warranty depends on the product and manufacturer. Please refer to the product page for warranty details.

faqs.ques: How do I update my address?
faqs.ans: You can update your address from the 'My Account' section under 'Manage Addresses'.

faqs.ques: What should I do if I received a damaged product?
faqs.ans: Please raise a return request within 48 hours of delivery, along with images of the damaged product.

faqs.ques: Can I change the delivery date?
faqs.ans: In most cases, delivery dates are system-generated and cannot be changed manually.

faqs.ques: Do you offer discounts for bulk purchases?
faqs.ans: Yes, bulk order discounts are available. Contact our sales team for more details.

faqs.ques: How do I apply a promo code?
faqs.ans: You can apply a promo code during checkout in the 'Apply Coupon' section.
